website_summaries.verdict: A hypoallergenic, pure quercetin supplement that's suitable for those with severe sensitivities.
pros: A pure and gentle formulation that's produced following strict safety and quality regulations
Free of artificial sweeteners, colors, flavors, preservatives, and fillers
Veggie caps are small and easy to swallow
Provides an effective natural solution for seasonal allergies and general inflammation
cons: Per capsule dosage is somewhat low

customer_reviews.title: it seems like I’m not the only suspecting of quercitin’s decline in ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked miraculously last year when I first took it, and I only had to take it for a few days and I was symptom free for weeks. However...this year for some odd reason it barely worked, and reading this other user’s review, it seems like I’m not the only suspecting of quercitin’s decline in quality...it’s really sad...I had to get actual allergy meds instead, quite disappointing considering how much I loved and trusted it
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box to the seal open
customer_reviews.text: I love this company and this product but I opened the box to discover the protective seal was opened...
customer_reviews.author: BoltYourDoor

customer_reviews.title: Good medicine, too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I really like the medication and it does what I need it to do. I highly recommend the medication. I just can't buy the Pure products because the claim their products are natural, which they very well could be, and therefore they charge almost double or triple what other products do. I found a bottle that had more pills and also says it's natural and works just as well and is more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy With It
customer_reviews.text: I have a mast cell disease and can no longer take ibuprofen and other NSAIDS without risk of reaction. I started taking Quercetin in September 2016 for its anti-inflammatory and mast cell stabilization properties. I selected the Pure Encapsulations brand after reading numerous reviews. I have had no reaction to it and it has been very effective in relieving my arthritis and lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Council

customer_reviews.title: Great natural alternative!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 18 months now. It really helps with seasonal allergies! I take it daily and very rarely do I have to take any other allergy medication. I used to take up to 5 a day over the counter tablets plus prescription allergy meds. Now I only have to take the OTC a few times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I took it one day and was feeling anxious and haven't taken it again. Will try again without other supplements and see if it has the same affect
customer_reviews.author: Islandlife

customer_reviews.title: Natural infection faith ter for me
customer_reviews.text: Quercitin helps to keep colds, flu and virus away for me. I have seasonal allergies and taking this regularity helps me breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Magie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a year or so and am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Garbarino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helping w/ my allergies in the week I've used it, new to this product but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Polyphenols have proven efficacy in the diet
customer_reviews.text: Good adjunct to diet supplements. Not an essential nutrient but strengthens body functions.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended this
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this for allergies and I find it helpful. I take 2 a day all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W. Druin

customer_reviews.title: helps allergies
customer_reviews.text: I started using to help my allergies, combined with Nettle, and think it's been helping.
customer_reviews.author: Trash101

customer_reviews.title: step away
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this item...i try this from doctor recommend for more than 3 months. i havent stop had this pill during the term..its totally not work at all....this item not that cheap and it not work. very disappointed..i finished 3 bottles then i got mad..waste of money
customer_reviews.author: yi pang

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality. Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand as always. I take as a help for histamine intolerance. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: macsongbird

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product testing and quality control are important to me and Pure Encapsulations does it the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for inflammation
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help with mcas and inflammation. Wish it was cheaper and higher dose. I am using other supplements however I strongly believe this is helping a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and good size bottles
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. I love the fact that you had it in the 120 count bottles, and I got it so quickly!! Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: caron swartz

customer_reviews.title: Histamine Relief
customer_reviews.text: Pure Encapsulations brand is high quality with little to no additives, flow agents, or fillers. This quercetin helps stabilize mast cells thereby lowering histamine levels in the blood. Works very well for our family. We now have less sinus issues and allergy symptoms. This quercetin has also helped my husband with his vertigo. The four star rating is due to price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brown

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this company and the purity of its products. Not a lot of fillers. But you pay for what you get, so it's a bit more expensive. Personally, I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Some of the capsules had broken and all the capsules ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the capsules had broken and all the capsules were covered with yellow product. Still taking because I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PE recently sold out to Nestle
customer_reviews.text: After years of PureEncapsulations being my favorite supplement company, I suddenly began experiencing problems with their products. Then I found out that PE recently sold out to Nestle. I am devastated! I have a hard time finding supplements I can tolerate, and there are several which I could only get in a form I can tolerate from PE. I don't know what I am going to do. Such a shame to see what was the best purest and most reliable supplement company ever trashed.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Allergies be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for leaky gut healing, but for my kids and dog, I use it for their allergies. Works amazing! Within a half hour, the kids are not sniffing. Our dog has auto-immune reactive lung issues from allergies every January-April, and for the first time in years, I have been able to get him off medications because of Quercetin! It blocks the histamine response, and my kids and dog do not need meds. I am so happy for this!
customer_reviews.author: happyrunnergirl

customer_reviews.title: Good Immune System Support
customer_reviews.text: I take Quercetin daily for its anti-histamine qualities. It has been an effective tool in my ongoing battle with histamine issues especially when it's combined with vitamin C. Pure Encapsulations is my preferred brand because it is free of common fillers and flow agents that have caused me problems. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I take it with Vitamin C and Zinc. Quercetin with vitamin C helps my minor allergy. Clears up my nose pretty fast. Add zinc to the mix for potential antiviral and anti cancer properties.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't but again
customer_reviews.text: I'm certain this is something great brand. I realize you don't always see outward signs when supplements may be working. We've been talking this for a while now and we see no benefits. I won't buy them again and wouldn't recommend them due to our experience.
customer_reviews.author: MMC70

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Found this wonderful product about a year after having my gall bladder removed. Wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: My digestive system reacted very badly to the fiber fillers use in this product which caused pain and distress. That's $38 totally wasted. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura HaggartyTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Capsules are 500 mg.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and effiecient delivery. Product as stated . A must have for allergy season
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A. Triggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for 2 mos. so far it helps
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by my Dt.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying we will see. So far this exam no tumors
customer_reviews.author: Dean Myers

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by urologist. Used in combination with pollen extract to mitigate prostatitis symptoms. Saw palmeiro worsen my condition. I will recommend to talk to your urologist before taking any supplement supplement.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, fast shipping and very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: E. Matkin

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my doctor
customer_reviews.text: Have not taken long enough to know if it is helpful. Recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Love Cats

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product sent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 200mg capsules, but received the 500mg. This supplemented was recommended by my 2 year old’s pediatrician, but she is only to have a max of 200mg.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

product_meta.title: Pure Encapsulations - Quercetin - Hypoallergenic Supplement with Bioflavonoids for Cellular, Cardiometabolic and Immune Health* - 120 Capsules
product_meta.description: Quercetin is formulated to help support cellular, cardiometabolic and immune health. Quercetin is one of the most bioactive flavonoids and helps maintain mast cell function.*
feature_bullets: Immune Health: Quercetin facilitates healthy mast cell function by supporting healthy enzyme activity.*
Bioflavonoids: Quercetin has been shown to be one of the most bioactive flavonoids. Research suggests a supportive role for cellular, immune and cardiometabolic health.*
Antioxidant Support: Quercetin promotes cardiovascular health by protecting lipids from oxidation and supporting the health of capillaries by enhancing their strength and integrity.*

Pure Ingredients: Pure Encapsulations manufactures a line of hypoallergenic, research-based dietary supplements. Products are meticulously formulated using pure ingredients designed to deliver predictable results for the benefit of all patients, even the most sensitive.*

Free From: Pure Encapsulations products are free from wheat, gluten, egg, peanuts, magnesium stearate, hydrogenated fat, artificial sweeteners and colors, and other unnecessary excipients. Any product containing ingredients derived from allergens, such as soy, dairy or shellfish is clearly labeled. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
